comment: Aww, thank you so much for your thoughtful sentiments, Jeff!! They mean a lot! It is an honor to share my journey and help our amazing community. Were in this together. So glad your health is well.

comment: as a time heart transplant recipient, this article and your voice are incredibly important. Thank you for your contributions on a national level! With love and life, Jeff.
amr:
